duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform semi-skilled and skilled painting tasks within school facilities.
Prepare surfaces for painting by using de-glossers, solvents or sandpaper.
Mix materials used such as paint, stains, varnishes, enamels, epoxies and lacquers.
Assist in hanging, taping, and finishing sheetrock as needed.
Assist with the removal of graffiti from various surfaces on school buildings using pressure washer and a variety of paint solvents.
Make minor repairs to and clean equipment associated with job duties.
Assist in the marking of asphalt areas.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalency Certificate required.
